General.Name: Mpower Group Ltd
General.Description: MPower Group Limited designs and delivers renewable energy, battery storage, and microgrid solutions for blue chip corporate and government customers in Australia. The company engages in the design, construction, installation, and commissioning of power system projects; and monitoring, and service and maintenance of power system assets. It also finances power system projects. The company was formerly known as Tag Pacific Limited and changed its name to MPower Group Limited in January 2019. MPower Group Limited was incorporated in 1963 and is based in Sydney, Australia.
